dublin_core.dcvalue: Established in 2014 the Greentree Consensus is a set of principles that seek to serve as living guidelines that are meant to inform but not dictate the design of technology enabled development programs To advance the field of ICT4D the Greentree Consensus asks development professionals and technologists to help translate these abstract principles into practical action via sharing experiences on their community forum

Made available in DSpace on 2020-06-10T08:52:39Z (GMT).
